Articles.Content: I noticed that MechJeb has it's own program language, I never used this feature, but I wonder if it could be programmed to launch capsule to Minimus using Mun as gravity assist, it can be helpful in 0.17 when will be more planets and moons.

Yes, it could be used for this.

You can program it to do pretty much any flight you want, as far as I know.
